translations: 大学一年级新生；新手（freshman 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Only under special circumstances freshmen are permitted to take make-up tests.
sentences.translation: 只有在特殊情况下才会允许大一新生参加补考。

sentences.sentence: Snyder and his colleagues found that the level of hope among freshmen at the beginning of their first semester was a more accurate predictor of their college grades.
sentences.translation: 斯奈德和同事们发现，新生在第一学期开始时抱有的希望程度能更准确地预测他们的大学成绩。

sentences.sentence: A case in point is the study by Linda Sax at UCLA, who used data from a large national survey of college freshmen to evaluate the effect of single-sex versus coeducational high schools.
sentences.translation: 加州大学洛杉矶分校的琳达·萨克斯的研究就是一个恰当的例子，她利用了一项全国性的大一新生调查来评估单性别高中和男女混合高中的效果。
